citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility did not have a documented and veterinary approved environmental enrichment plan available at the time of
inspection, although multiple enrichment strategies were in place. Documented and veterinary approved plans for
enrichment ensure that appropriate strategies are in place that account for psychological well being, environmental needs
and any special considerations for birds requiring special attention. The facility must ensure that there is a documented
and approved environmental enrichment plan.
Correct by 29 December 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

and any special considerations for birds requiring special attention. The facility must ensure that there is a documented
